response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly enhance your endeavors. Considering its unparalleled quality and the unique benefits it offers, we believe it is worth $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the extensive research, development, and innovation that have gone into creating this masterpiece. We are confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you, given its worth to you is estimated at $1,500,000. We look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can make this transaction mutually beneficial.", "product_price": 1200000}
